meanings.definition: Convert (an image or font) into a raster image.
meanings.sent1: I rasterized the logo to make it suitable for printing.
meanings.sent2: The digital drawing was rasterized for better quality.
meanings.sent3: When I accidentally rasterized the photo, it looked like a pixelated mess.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were rasterized in my mind, each moment a distinct pixel.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully rasterized the landscape, capturing every detail.

meanings.definition: Represent (an image or font) as a set of pixels.
meanings.sent1: The software rasterized the text to display it clearly on screen.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer rasterized the logo to ensure sharpness.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly said I could rasterize my thoughts into pixels for easier understanding.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were rasterized on his face, each expression a pixel in the grand picture.
meanings.sent5: The map was rasterized, making navigation easier with clear pixelated landmarks.
